level.heading: Child safety helmet assistance program.
level.text: The District Department of Transportation shall adopt a helmet assistance program which shall include grants and discount programs to assist indigent parents and guardians of children under 16 years of age in obtaining safety helmets.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 17-184 substituted "District Department of Transportation" for "District of Columbia Department of Public Works".
D.C. Law 17-353 validated a previously made technical correction.
